div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.

{% capture grouping_desc %}These define the properties by which a RESTful server can be searched. They can also be used for sorting and including related resources.{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Reference value held by characteristic{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Profile on the R4 Group resource to for [Argonaut Patient List Project](https://confluence.hl7.org/display/AP/Argonaut+Project+Home). Note that the [Group](http://hl7.org/fhir/group.html) resource is used for this patient **list** use case even though there is also a FHIR List resource{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}A reference to the Appointment that is the *reason* the target patient is a member of this Group.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}A reference to the Encounter that is the *reason* the target patient is a member of this Group.{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}A reference to a form definition that is bound to certain types of lists and defines each column for the purpose of providing additional data for each member{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}A reference to a QuestionnaireResponse of prepopulated form that provides additional data about the target patient. The form is defined by the [Patient List Questionnaire]() that is bound to the Group using the Argonaut Patient List Questionnaire extension. This extension **SHALL NOT** be used if the Argonaut Patient List Questionnaire extension is not present on the Group resource{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define sets of codes used by systems conforming to this implementation guide{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or....{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These define new code systems used by systems conforming to this implementation guide{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or 'team' or 'organization' or 'practitioner'{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}
